name: Alfred
hook: Saw the $27M Series A via Sequoia. Your autonomous market research focus is a perfect fit for our simulation tech.

name: Rotem
hook: Congrats on the $25M Series A and the Venice rebrand. Identity security is a critical variable in our current engine.

name: Alex
hook: The $40M raise from a16z and Sequoia is massive. We are building a simulation engine that heavily relies on your LLM routing.

name: Amos
hook: Obsessed with your work on the autonomous business model. We are running a parallel thesis on startup probability.

name: Dino
hook: The $600M Series C for Saronic is a historic milestone for maritime autonomous systems. Massive respect.

name: Fei-Fei
hook: The $1B raise for foundational 3D AI models is the frontier we monitor. I'd love to share our success probability benchmarks.

name: Mikhail
hook: The $30B Series G is a testament to the safety-first approach. We use Claude extensively for our engine's logic.

name: Arshia
hook: Unicorn status with the $100M Series B is incredible. Your AI agentic accounting is the bedrock of future scale.

name: Peter
hook: The $70M raise for AI enterprise finance is a huge validation of the sector. We are simulating scale for similar systems.

name: Mati
hook: The $11B valuation is visionary. We are exploring voice-first startup analysis and your tech is the gold standard.
